title: is there any charts on what bard meep autos proc
body: because i heard he's getting a damage buff or something like that and i want to know what all on hit/spell affects he can apply in 1 auto before he becomes somewhat common

replies.body:
Everything on-hit is applied to the main target, meeps are just an on-hit effect themselves.

Duskblade, Triforce, Dark Harvest, Firecannon is hilarious. Makes a moronic noise for around 1500+ damage late game.
